雖死猶榮.definition: lit. although dead, also honored; died a glorious death

雖死猶生.definition: lit. although dead, as if still alive (idiom); still with us in spirit

雖然.definition: although; even though (often used correlatively with 可是[ke3 shi4] or 但是[dan4 shi4] etc)

雖遲但到.definition: (slang) slow to arrive but eventually shows up
